products.title: Adventure Rainbow Roman Blind
products.description: Combining bright colour, fun design and educational content makes this children's atlas fabric a perfect addition to their rooms. Product id: db-rom0922 fabric colour: rainbow material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes adventure rainbow roman blind in blue/multicoloured.

products.title: Phoebe Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: Once the phoebe rainbow is on display, there's no missing it. A contemporary and somewhat abstract floral pattern displays rose pinks, sunshine yellows, and citrus oranges, as well as apple greens and petrol blues, forming a plethora of colour across the canvas. Use the rainbow in any room where you want to make a statement. A room with plenty of sunlight will complement this blind best, and surround it with similar sunny yellow and oranges for a cheery, uplifting look.

products.title: Harper Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a rainbow of colour and an explosion of shades that give this offering from the harper range its name you'll be able to add something enticing and eclectic to your interior. The real depth stems from the intriguing contrast between the zesty oranges and calmer pinks. A light blue feature wall and a light brown laminate floor are great ways to introduce this symphony of colour into the living room.
